author: Cybernews
description:
A 19-year-old honor student and his crew pulled off a $243M crypto scam, using social engineering tactics to steal the fortune and flaunting their ill-gotten wealth online. Their over-the-top spending and public boasting drew the attention of a rival gang, who attempted to kidnap one of the scammers' parents, exposing a bizarre web of greed and incompetence.

title: How Honor Student's Crypto Scam Got His Parents Kidnapped
